Topic.Title: Is April 18th confirmed as the earnings date?

Message.Msg: Yes. 4:30PM on the 18th. You can look on IBM's website, investors and events

Topic.Title: Is April 18th confirmed as the earnings date?

Message.Msg: Shortly after that they will have their board meeting and set and announce the dividend rate for the next year, which will start with the next payment. I am hoping they bump it up to a buck. I also think their is a small possibility that they split the shares (if not now, it will come after they move up through $220 - DJ doesn't want any share price so high it gets a totally unbalanced weighting - that's why Google isn't there) . So how about a 2:1 split and 50 cents a share starting with the next payment.
